Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 74th overall pick, by Toledo in 1979...
Injured on 7/19/1981 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/28/1982 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/19/1984...
Had first career hit on 7/29/1984, off Manuel Cortes (WIS)...
Traded from Toledo to Pittsburgh on 2/19/1985 (Going to PIT: P W. Eyman. Going to TOL: P D. Castrejon, LF L. Jackson)...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
